text: New Democracy (ND; , Nea Dimokratia) is a liberal-conservative political party in Greece. Konstantinos Karamanlis founded the party in 1974. It is a center- right party, with many liberal ideas. Its main rival is the Panhellenic Socialist Movement, commonly known as PASOK. title: New Democracy (Greece)
